title: PlayStation Making Game Pass Competitor Codenamed Spartacus - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.03.21
description:
Janet and special guest Rebekah Valentine of IGN discuss PlayStation's reported subscription service, Take-Two going after It Takes Two, and more!

Follow Rebekah: https://twitter.com/duckvalentine

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:30 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy, Black Jack, & Greg Miller Returns to Content Next Month, Nick Should Quit Now
The Roper Report   -
00:03:30 - PlayStation Plans New Service to Take On Xbox Game Pass - Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:10:27 - Josef Fares' It Takes Two hit by Take-Two claim - Tom Philips @ Eurogamer
00:18:40 - Paper Mario Is Coming to Nintendo Switch Online -  Jared Moore @ IGN
00:36:20 -  Ad
00:39:45 - Jak and Daxter’s Anniversary
00:45:00 - PlayStation Meals
00:54:10 - Out today
00:59:00 - You‘re Wrong
